price: Kuma suka ce: "Don me ba a saukar da wannan Alƙur'ãni a kan wani mutum mai girma daga alƙaryun* nan biyu ba?"
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَتَيۡنِ عَظِيمٍ
footnotes: * Sunã nufin Makka da tã'ifa, kuma sunã nufi a saukar da Alƙur'ãni ga walĩdu ɗan Mugĩra na Makka kõ ga Urwatu ɗan Mas'ũdi As saƙafi a Ta'ifa. Watau sunã sũkar Muhammadu dõmin bã shi da dũkiya. A gare su mai dũkiya shĩ ne babban mutum, wanda ya cancanta Allah Ya aiko shi ga mutãne.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā nuzzila hādhā al-qur'ānu ʿalā rajulin mina al-qaryatayni ʿaẓīmin
